txt.en: 'Good to see you my friend. There are Orcs in Ab-dâna that are getting orders from something beyond them. We need you to eliminate these Orcs and recover the orders.'
There is no twist in this mission.
You have successfully eliminated Orcs within Ab-dâna and recovered the orders they have been receiving. Return with the scout to Ashâmi with this report.
Your mission is to travel to Ab-dâna and defeat Orcs you find there to recover any order they may have.
'[placeholder], your task is to travel to Ab-dâna and eliminate Orcs you find there to recover any orders they have so that we can discover who is sending them.'
'Welcome back, [placeholder]. I am glad you were able to recover what you could from the Orcs, we will take the time to uncover who is sending them.\n\n'You have my thanks.'
Complete Mission: Orders from the Highest
Your mission is to travel to Ab-dâna and eliminate Orcs you find there to recover any orders they have so that Ashâmi can discover who is sending them.\n\nSpeak to Ashâmi to travel.
